SEARCH:

Klasse Action

java.lang.Object
Action
public class Action extends Object
an action contains all information of STRIPS-ACT

  • Feldübersicht

    Felder
    Modifizierer und Typ
    Feld
    Beschreibung
    private ArrayList<Predicate>
    effects
    list of the effects in the precondition of this action
    private final int
    id
    each action has a unique id
    private static int
    idCounter
    counter to set the unique action ids
    private String
    name
    name of this action
    private int
    planStepId
    every action has the planStepId of the associated PlanStep, except the input available actions that are stored in a list as available actions for the planner, these have planStepId = -1 thePlanStepId get set when the action is inserted in any PlanStep, by default it is -1
    private ArrayList<Predicate>
    preconditions
    list of the preconditions in the precondition of this action
    private int
    priority
    priority of this action

  • Felddetails

    • name

      private String name
      name of this action

    • priority

      private int priority
      priority of this action

    • preconditions

      private ArrayList<Predicate> preconditions
      list of the preconditions in the precondition of this action

    • effects

      private ArrayList<Predicate> effects
      list of the effects in the precondition of this action

    • id

      private final int id
      each action has a unique id

    • idCounter

      private static int idCounter
      counter to set the unique action ids

    • planStepId

      private int planStepId
      every action has the planStepId of the associated PlanStep, except the input available actions that are stored in a list as available actions for the planner, these have planStepId = -1 thePlanStepId get set when the action is inserted in any PlanStep, by default it is -1

    • Action

      public Action(String name, int priority, ArrayList<Predicate> preconditions, ArrayList<Predicate> effects) throws IllegalArgumentException
      create a new action with copies of given properties
      Parameter:
      name - of the action
      priority - of the action
      preconditions - of the action
      effects - of the action
      Löst aus:
      IllegalArgumentException - if (name == null) or (preconditions == null) or (preconditions.contains(null)) or (effects == null) or (effects.contains(null))

    • equals

      public boolean equals(Object obj)
      this action is equal to an Object if it is an Action, and the id, name, priority, the preconditions and effect, have the same values
